definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)

sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通过专项整治，再现京城水系和古典园林的历史风貌。

sentences.english: And you've confirmed once again the fundamental decency and generosity of the American people,” Obama said.
sentences.chinese: 你们再现了美国人民最本质的礼尚和慷慨。

sentences.english: Adding to Chinese unease is the reappearance of Russia on the scene.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯的再现也令中国不安。

sentences.english: Huangpu River permanent fountain depicts a group of moving stories of this period.
sentences.chinese: 黄浦江边一组永久性喷泉再现了这段动人的佳话。

sentences.english: MOTOMAN-UP6 robot is a traditional playback robot.
sentences.chinese: UP6型机器人为传统的示教再现机器人。

sentences.english: What tendency will be shown in the reproduction of medical disputes?
sentences.chinese: 在再现医疗纠纷的过程中将表现出怎样的媒介倾向。

sentences.english: All sorts of article and multiform emersion " contracted reservation " .
sentences.chinese: 各种物品和各种形式都再现“简约含蓄”。

sentences.english: This great battle was vividly recorded in the documentary film.
sentences.chinese: 这部记录片生动地再现了这场伟大的战役。

sentences.english: I have found them hardy, and hopefully they will reappear this summer.
sentences.chinese: 我发现它们抗逆性强，今年夏天也有望再现。

sentences.english: The results demonstrated the main observed characteristics of the loop-like coronal mass ejection.
sentences.chinese: 模拟结果再现了环状日冕物质抛射的主要观测特征。

sentences.english: The theory and experiment in di cates the measure can reduce playback error efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 理论和实验表明，该措施能有效地减少再现误差。

sentences.english: Is gauge Repeatability and Reproducabilty less than 10%?
sentences.chinese: 所有量检具的重复性和再现性是否小于10%？

sentences.english: In aesthetic representation of beauty in sound, rhythm and onomatopoetic are further discussed.
sentences.chinese: 音美再现中主要讨论了节奏和拟声的再现。

sentences.english: In aesthetic representation of beauty in sound, rhythm and onomatopoetic are further discussed.
sentences.chinese: 音美再现中主要讨论了节奏和拟声的再现。

sentences.english: New ball physics accurately recreate bouncing, skidding and topspin.
sentences.chinese: 球的新的物理性能精准地再现球的反弹，滑动和上旋。

sentences.english: Autostereoscopic display technology can redisplay the lost depth information.
sentences.chinese: 自由立体显示技术可以再现丢失的深度信息。

definition: to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to screen (a movie)/to stage (a play)/a screening/a staging
to pick up (a theme etc)/to regain (confidence)/to revive (a custom, friendship etc)
to reveal/to display/to show/to exhibit sth
